participant_1.background:
I would put a rattle in my baby's nursery because it is a classic toy that is fun for babies to play with.
i vacation in florida every winter.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
i am a musician.
i like to fly model airplanes.

participant_2.background:
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.
i enjoy clothing with exotic prints.
my mom is my favorite person of all people.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.
My mom is my biggest inspiration, and I'm grateful for my friends who have stayed by my side.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks for asking! I'm just relaxing at home, watching some TV.
That sounds nice. I'm just getting ready to head out for a run.
Oh, that's cool. I used to run a lot, but I haven't been lately.
You should get back into it! It's a great way to stay in shape.
Yeah, I know. I've been meaning to start running again.
Well, if you do, let me know! I'd love to have a running buddy.
Will do! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to concerts, play video games, and hang out with friends.
Oh, cool. I like to go to concerts too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Nice! I like rock too. I'm a big fan of classic rock.
Oh, that's cool. I like classic rock too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles too.
Me too! They're my favorite band of all time.
I can see why. They're amazing.
Yeah, they are.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good run!
Thanks! You too!
